Description: You are bidding on a Used HONDO H77 ELECTRIC GUITAR WHITE. This guitar is in great condition. There are light scratches and some pick wear on the body however there are no major chips, cracks, or flaws in the finish. The frets are in good condition and the neck is straight and smooth. The headstock is in good condition as well with just some minor wear. Everything on this guitar is functional and tested. The only issue is a spot from where is was dropped previously and the finish chipped at the bottom. Please see photos for the actual item you will receive! This guitar is right handed and has a WHITE body. There are 2 pickups in it with a 3 way switch, volume knob, tone knob, and tremolo system. This guitar is in great condition and works well. Please see condition description for the actual condition of this guitar. Please see the photos for the actual item you will receive from this listing.
